activities.name: GetCommitSourceColumnListToVariable
activities.description: Get Commit Source Column List to Variable

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Declare @cols varchar(max)
DECLARE @SQLCode nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode=SQLCode from stg.SQLCode WHERE TYPE='EBPP'
SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)
Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList
   FROM (SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
	UNION
	SELECT replace(replace(replace(@SQLCode,'T1','CONVERT(NVARCHAR(512),'+ConfigList+')'),'K1','0x'+'@{variables('CK1')}'),'K2','0x'+'@{variables('CK2')}') + ' as ' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(ConfigList,'[',''),1,2)+SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REPLACE(ConfigList,']','')),1,2)+CASE WHEN len(Replace(Replace(ConfigList,'[',''),']',''))>4 then SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,4) else SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,2) end as ConfigList
	   from (SELECT value as ConfigList
	   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
	  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
	  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'
		AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
		AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
	  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
					   from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
	     			  where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value))	
					  )
	UNION 
	SELECT ConfigList
	   from (   
		   SELECT '(DATEDIFF(hour,DateOfBirth,GETDATE())/8766) [Age]'  ConfigList
		   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
		  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
		  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'
			AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
			AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}'
			AND CHARINDEX('DateOfBirth', lower(ltrim(rtrim(value)))) > 0 
		) SourceConfigInDM
	  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
					  from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 				  				 				  
				  )
	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery, @ColList as ColumnList

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportCommitmentToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
     AND RunId=@{variables('RunId')}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

SELECT 1

If exists (select 1 from mtd.SourceConfigForImport where  SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'    AND StagingTableName='@{item().StagingTableName}'  and ColumnNamesToMask<>'')

    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM

  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'
    AND StagingTableName='@{item().StagingTableName}'
        ) SourceConfigInDM
  UNION
SELECT replace(replace(replace(@SQLCode,'T1','CONVERT(NVARCHAR(512),'+ConfigList+')'),'K1','0x'+'@{variables('CQK1')}'),'K2','0x'+'@{variables('CQK2')}') + ' as ' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(ConfigList,'[',''),1,2)+SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REPLACE(ConfigList,']','')),1,2)+CASE WHEN len(Replace(Replace(ConfigList,'[',''),']',''))>4 then SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,4) else SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,2) end as ConfigList
   from (SELECT value as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'
    AND StagingTableName='@{item().StagingTableName}'
      ) SourceConfigInDM
	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;
end
else If exists (select 1 from mtd.SourceConfigForImport where  SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'    AND StagingTableName='@{item().StagingTableName}'  and ColumnNamesToMask='')
Begin
SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList
   FROM (SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'
    AND StagingTableName='@{item().StagingTableName}'
        ) SourceConfigInDM
 ) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;
End

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT  SourceTableName as Table_Name, SourceSchemaName as Schema_Name,PLTableName as PLTableName FROM [Mtd].[SourceConfigForImport] Where SourceDatabaseName='CRSDelivery' and IsEnabled=1 and FullCopyToPL=1

declare @cols varchar(max)

SELECT  @cols = STUFF
    (
        ( 
            SELECT DISTINCT '],[' + column_name
            FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
            where table_name='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
                 and table_schema='@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}'
            FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 2, ''
    ) + ']';

SELECT @cols Columns

Declare @cols varchar(max)
DECLARE @SQLCode nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode=SQLCode from stg.SQLCode WHERE TYPE='EBPP'
SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)
Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)
Declare @SourceQuerycollist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList
   FROM (SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='CRSDelivery'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
  UNION
SELECT replace(replace(replace(@SQLCode,'T1','CONVERT(NVARCHAR(512),'+ConfigList+')'),'K1','0x'+'@{variables('AK1')}'),'K2','0x'+'@{variables('AK2')}') + ' as ' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(ConfigList,'[',''),1,2)+SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REPLACE(ConfigList,']','')),1,2)+CASE WHEN len(Replace(Replace(ConfigList,'[',''),']',''))>4 then SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,4) else SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,2) end as ConfigList
   from (SELECT value as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='CRSDelivery'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                   from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
	     	      where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;

SET @SourceQuerycollist =  case when CHARINDEX('[Postcode]',@collist) > 0 Then replace(@collist,'[Postcode]','trim(left([Postcode],4)) As [Postcode]') Else @collist End
SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @SourceQuerycollist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 
SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery,@collist as ColumnList

INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,ADFTaskType
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT 
        @{variables('RunId')}
	   ,'Step-5'
	   ,'NA'
	   ,'ImportCRSDeliveryToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportCRSDeliveryToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
     AND RunId=@{variables('RunId')}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT  SourceTableName as Table_Name, SourceSchemaName as Schema_Name,PLTableName as PLTableName FROM [Mtd].[SourceConfigForImport] Where SourceDatabaseName='Users' and IsEnabled=1 and FullCopyToPL=1

declare @cols varchar(max)

SELECT  @cols = STUFF
    (
        ( 
            SELECT DISTINCT '], [' + column_name
            FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
            where table_name='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
                 and table_schema='@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}'
            FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 2, ''
    ) + ']';

SELECT @cols Columns

Declare @cols varchar(max)
DECLARE @SQLCode nvarchar(max)


SELECT @SQLCode=SQLCode from stg.SQLCode WHERE TYPE='EBPP'


SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)

Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList
   FROM (SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Users'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
  UNION
SELECT replace(replace(replace(@SQLCode,'T1','CONVERT(NVARCHAR(512),'+ConfigList+')'),'K1','0x'+'@{variables('UK1')}'),'K2','0x'+'@{variables('UK2')}') + ' as ' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(ConfigList,'[',''),1,2)+SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REPLACE(ConfigList,']','')),1,2)+CASE WHEN len(Replace(Replace(ConfigList,'[',''),']',''))>4 then SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,4) else SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,2) end as ConfigList
   from (SELECT value as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Users'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                   from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
	     	      where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))

	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;

 

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery, @ColList as ColumnList

sqlReaderQuery.value:
INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT 
        @{variables('RunId')}
	   ,'Step-2'
	   ,'ADF-ImportDataFromFile'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

DECLARE @RunId int
DECLARE @RetentionDate datetime

SET @RunId = @{variables('RunId')}

SELECT @RetentionDate=DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()) 

/* Run Validation Checks if Import File is Successful */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='ADF-ImportDataFromFile' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@RunId)
BEGIN 
EXEC dbo.RunValidationChecks @{variables('RunId')}
END
ELSE RAISERROR( 'Import Data From File Failed in ADF -Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)



/* Import Valid Records to Target Clone Tables */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='RunValidationChecks' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@RunId) 
BEGIN
EXEC dbo.LoadTargetCloneTables @{variables('RunId')}
END
ELSE RAISERROR( 'Validation Checks Failed-Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)


/* Swap Clone Tables With Live */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='LoadTargetCloneTables' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@RunId) 
BEGIN
EXEC dbo.LoadTargetTables @{variables('RunId')}
END
ELSE RAISERROR( 'Loading Clone Tables Failed-Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)



--/* Update History Table with Processed File */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='LoadTargetTables' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@RunId)
BEGIN
EXEC dbo.UpdateHistoryTable @{variables('RunId')},@RetentionDate
END
ELSE RAISERROR( 'Loading Target Tables Failed-Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)




--/* Raise Error if Updating History Table Failed */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='UpdateHistoryTable' and Execution_Status<>1 and RunId=@{variables('RunId')})
BEGIN
RAISERROR( 'Updating History Table Failed-Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)
END


IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='UpdateHistoryTable' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@{variables('RunId')})
BEGIN
UPDATE Mgmt.Log_RunId SET EndDateTime=getdate() Where Run_Id=@{variables('RunId')}
END

SELECT '1'

DECLARE @LogID int
 DECLARE @ErrorMessage varchar(max)
 DECLARE @RunId Bigint
 DECLARE @ErrorId int



 SET @Runid=@{variables('RunId')}


 SELECT @LogID = MAX(LogID)
   FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
  WHERE StoredProcedureName='ADF-ImportDataFromFile'

  INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Error_Details
	  (
	   ErrorProcedure
	  ,ErrorMessage
	  ,ErrorDateTime
	  ,Run_Id
	  )
  SELECT 
        
	    'ADF-ImportDataFromFile',
            @{concat('''',replace(activity('CopyFileToDb').Error.message,'''',''''''),'''')},
	    GETDATE(),
		@RunId as RunId; 

  SELECT @ErrorId=MAX(ErrorId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Error_Details

/* Update Log Execution Results as Fail if there is an Error*/

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=0
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,ErrorId=@ErrorId
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@RunId

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mtd.MarketoFilterConfig WHERE ISNULL(ImportStatus,0)=0)
  BEGIN
  SELECT MFC_ID,StartDateFilter,EndDateFilter,'History' as FilterType
  FROM Mtd.MarketoFilterConfig
  WHERE MFC_Id IN (
  SELECT min(mfc_id)
    FROM Mtd.MarketoFilterConfig
   WHERE Isnull(ImportStatus,0)=0)
   END
   ELSE 
   BEGIN
   select -1 as MFC_ID
         ,convert(varchar,cast(getdate()-1 as date))+'T00:00:00Z' as StartDateFilter
		 ,convert(varchar,cast(getdate() as date))+'T00:00:00Z' as EndDateFilter
		 ,'Latest' as FilterType
   END

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ASData_PL.MarketoPrograms WHERE ISNULL(LeadProgramImportStatus,0)=0)
  BEGIN
  IF ((SELECT isnull(LeadProgramImportStatus,0) from AsData_PL.MarketoPrograms WHERE ProgramId=1208) =0) -- Get Redundancy First
  BEGIN
  SELECT ProgramId,ProgramName
    FROM ASData_PL.MarketoPrograms
   WHERE ProgramId=1208
  END
  ELSE BEGIN
 SELECT ProgramId,ProgramName
 FROM AsData_PL.MarketoPrograms
WHERE ProgramId in 
  (SELECT max(ProgramId) as ProgramId
    FROM ASData_PL.MarketoPrograms
   WHERE ISNULL(LeadProgramImportStatus,0)=0)
   END
   END
   ELSE 
   BEGIN
   UPDATE AsData_PL.MarketoPrograms
         SET LeadProgramImportStatus=0

  SELECT ProgramId,ProgramName
    FROM AsData_PL.MarketoPrograms
WHERE ProgramId in 
  (SELECT max(ProgramId) as ProgramId
    FROM ASData_PL.MarketoPrograms
   WHERE ISNULL(LeadProgramImportStatus,0)=0)
    END

	UPDATE Mtd.MarketoFilterConfig

	 WHERE MFC_Id=@{activity('GetDateFilterValuesForLeads').output.firstRow.MFC_ID}
END

	 WHERE MFC_Id=@{activity('GetDateFilterValuesForActivities').output.firstRow.MFC_ID}
END

IF ('@{activity('GetDateFilterValuesForPrograms').output.firstRow.FilterType}'='History')

	   SET ImportStatus=1
	      ,ImportDate=GETDATE()
	 WHERE MFCP_Id=@{activity('GetDateFilterValuesForPrograms').output.firstRow.MFCP_ID}

	 WHERE ProgramId=@{activity('GetProgramFilterValues').output.firstRow.ProgramId}
